languages.text: {n}На плечах немолодого мужчины покоится массивная энергетическая катушка, как у техножрецов. Она ни к чему не подключена и удерживается ремнями, а ее вес согнул спину вашего собеседника, наделив его горбом. Одна из рук заменена изысканным аугментом техписца, но перья и стилусы ужасно затуплены, словно ими скребли камни, а привод конечности неактивен.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}На плечах немолодого мужчины покоится массивная энергетическая катушка, как у техножрецов. Она ни к чему не подключена и удерживается ремнями, а ее вес согнул спину вашего собеседника, наделив его горбом. Одна из рук заменена изысканным аугментом техписца, но перья и стилусы ужасно затуплены, словно ими скребли камни, а привод конечности неактивен.{/n}
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: {n}The middle-aged man carries a potentia coil on his shoulders, after the manner of Tech-Priests. It is held in place by straps and is not connected to anything. Its weight has given him a hunched back. One of his arms has been replaced by an exquisite tech-scribe augmetic, but the quills and styli are incredibly dull as though they have been scraped against bare rock, and the limb's servo motor is dormant.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}На плечах немолодого мужчины покоится массивная энергетическая катушка, как у техножрецов. Она ни к чему не подключена и удерживается ремнями, а ее вес согнул спину вашего собеседника, наделив его горбом. Одна из рук заменена изысканным аугментом техписца, но перья и стилусы ужасно затуплены, словно ими скребли камни, а привод конечности неактивен.{/n}

languages.text: {n}中年の男はポテンシア・コイルを肩に巻いて持ち運んでおり、技術司祭の行動をなぞっているようだ。コイルはストラップで固定されており、どこにもつながってはいない。その重さのせいで男は猫背になっていた。彼の片腕は精巧な技術書記のオーグメティックに付け替えられているが、羽ペンとスタイラスは裸の岩でも削ったかのようにひどく書き味が悪そうだし、腕のサーヴォモーターは動いていない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The middle-aged man carries a potentia coil on his shoulders, after the manner of Tech-Priests. It is held in place by straps and is not connected to anything. Its weight has given him a hunched back. One of his arms has been replaced by an exquisite tech-scribe augmetic, but the quills and styli are incredibly dull as though they have been scraped against bare rock, and the limb's servo motor is dormant.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}中年の男はポテンシア・コイルを肩に巻いて持ち運んでおり、技術司祭の行動をなぞっているようだ。コイルはストラップで固定されており、どこにもつながってはいない。その重さのせいで男は猫背になっていた。彼の片腕は精巧な技術書記のオーグメティックに付け替えられているが、羽ペンとスタイラスは裸の岩でも削ったかのようにひどく書き味が悪そうだし、腕のサーヴォモーターは動いていない。{/n}
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: {n}这个中年男人肩膀上挂着一个电位线圈，看起来就像技术神甫一样。这个线圈是由带子固定的，没有与任何其他东西相连，线圈的重量把他的脊背都压弯了。他的一只手臂也被精致的技术抄写植入物所取代，但植入物的羽毛和柱头磨损严重，就像是在光秃秃的岩石上刮过一样，肢体的伺服电机也处于休眠状态。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The middle-aged man carries a potentia coil on his shoulders, after the manner of Tech-Priests. It is held in place by straps and is not connected to anything. Its weight has given him a hunched back. One of his arms has been replaced by an exquisite tech-scribe augmetic, but the quills and styli are incredibly dull as though they have been scraped against bare rock, and the limb's servo motor is dormant.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这个中年男人肩膀上挂着一个电位线圈，看起来就像技术祭司一样。这个线圈是由带子固定的，没有与任何其他东西相连，线圈的重量把他的脊背都压弯了。他的一只手臂也被精致的技术抄写植入物所取代，但植入物的羽毛和柱头磨损严重，就像是在光秃秃的岩石上刮过一样，肢体的伺服电机也处于休眠状态。{/n}
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: {n}À la manière des technoprêtres, l'homme d'âge mûr arbore sur les épaules un transformateur de puissance maintenu en place par de simples lanières et dont le poids le force à voûter le dos en permanence. L'un de ses bras a été remplacé par un magnifique augmétique de technoscribe, mais les plumes et les stylets qui y sont rattachés sont usés jusqu'à la corde, comme s'ils avaient été délibérément frottés contre de la pierre brute, et le servomoteur semble être en sommeil.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The middle-aged man carries a potentia coil on his shoulders, after the manner of Tech-Priests. It is held in place by straps and is not connected to anything. Its weight has given him a hunched back. One of his arms has been replaced by an exquisite tech-scribe augmetic, but the quills and styli are incredibly dull as though they have been scraped against bare rock, and the limb's servo motor is dormant.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}À la manière des technoprêtres, l'homme d'âge mûr arbore sur les épaules un transformateur de puissance maintenu en place par de simples lanières et dont le poids le force à voûter le dos en permanence. L'un de ses bras a été remplacé par un magnifique augmétique de technoscribe, mais les plumes et les stylets qui y sont rattachés sont usés jusqu'à la corde, comme s'ils avaient été délibérément frottés contre de la pierre brute, et le servomoteur semble être en sommeil.{/n}
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: {n}El hombre lleva una bobina de potencia sobre sus hombros al igual que los tecnosacerdotes. Está sujeta por correas y no está conectada a nada. Se la ha encorvado la espalda por su peso. Ha reemplazado uno de sus brazos por un aumético tecnoescriba de gran calidad, pero las plumas y los estilógrafos están completamente desgastados, como si se hubieran raspado contra una roca, y el servomotor está inactivo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The middle-aged man carries a potentia coil on his shoulders, after the manner of Tech-Priests. It is held in place by straps and is not connected to anything. Its weight has given him a hunched back. One of his arms has been replaced by an exquisite tech-scribe augmetic, but the quills and styli are incredibly dull as though they have been scraped against bare rock, and the limb's servo motor is dormant.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El hombre lleva una bobina de potencia sobre sus hombros al igual que los tecnosacerdotes. Está sujeta por correas y no está conectada a nada. Se la ha encorvado la espalda por su peso. Ha reemplazado uno de sus brazos por un aumético tecnoescriba de gran calidad, pero las plumas y los estilógrafos están completamente desgastados, como si se hubieran raspado contra una roca, y el servomotor está inactivo.{/n}
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: {n}Der Mann mittleren Alters trägt eine Potentia-Spule auf den Schultern, wie es die Techpriester tun. Sie wird von Gurten gehalten und ist mit nichts verbunden. Durch ihr Gewicht hat er einen Buckel bekommen. Einer seiner Arme wurde durch exquisite Techschreiber-Augmentationen ersetzt, doch die Federn und Stifte sind unglaublich stumpf, als hätten sie an nacktem Felsen herumgekratzt, und der Servomotor der Gliedmaße schläft.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The middle-aged man carries a potentia coil on his shoulders, after the manner of Tech-Priests. It is held in place by straps and is not connected to anything. Its weight has given him a hunched back. One of his arms has been replaced by an exquisite tech-scribe augmetic, but the quills and styli are incredibly dull as though they have been scraped against bare rock, and the limb's servo motor is dormant.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Mann mittleren Alters trägt eine Potentia-Spule auf den Schultern, wie es die Techpriester tun. Sie wird von Gurten gehalten und ist mit nichts verbunden. Durch ihr Gewicht hat er einen Buckel bekommen. Einer seiner Arme wurde durch exquisite Techschreiber-Augmentationen ersetzt, doch die Federn und Stifte sind unglaublich stumpf, als hätten sie an nacktem Felsen herumgekratzt, und der Servomotor der Gliedmaße schläft.{/n}
traits.speaker: Chief

languages.text: {n}Orta yaşlı adam, omuzlarında Tekno Rahiplerinki gibi bir salahiyet bobini taşıyor. Kayışlarla yerine tutturulmuş, hiçbir şeye bağlı olmaksızın duruyor. Adamın sırtı, bobinin ağırlığı yüzünden kambur olmuş. Kollarından biri üst kalite bir tekno kâtip ogmetiğiyle değiştirilmiş. Ogmetiğin tüy kalemleri ve stilusları, kayaya sürtülerek çizilmişçesine kör duruyor. Uzvun hizmotoru da atıl bekliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The middle-aged man carries a potentia coil on his shoulders, after the manner of Tech-Priests. It is held in place by straps and is not connected to anything. Its weight has given him a hunched back. One of his arms has been replaced by an exquisite tech-scribe augmetic, but the quills and styli are incredibly dull as though they have been scraped against bare rock, and the limb's servo motor is dormant.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Orta yaşlı adam omuzlarında, Tekno Rahiplerinki gibi bir salahiyet bobini taşıyor. Kayışlarla yerine tutturulmuş ve herhangi bir şeye bağlı değil. Adamın sırtı onun ağırlığı nedeniyle kambur olmuş. Kollarından biri üst kalite bir tekno kâtip ogmetiğiyle değiştirilmiş ancak tüy kalemler ve stiluslar kayaya sürtülerek çizilmişçesine kör duruyorlar ve uzvun hizmotora atıl.{/n}
traits.speaker: Chief
